sentences.en: A bazaar was held for the benefit of the victims of the natural calamity.
A bazaar was held for the poor.
And everybody was going to the bazaar and the ball tonight except her.
sentences.cn: 除她以外,人人都要参加今晚的义卖和舞会.

sentences.en: And how shocked everybody had been when she danced at the bazaar.
sentences.cn: 而且,她在那次义卖会上跳舞时人人都大为震惊呢.

sentences.en: Betty and Bob brought back blue balloons from the big bazaar.
sentences.cn: 贝蒂和鲍勃在大型的义卖市场买了蓝汽球回来.

sentences.en: Chickens, goats and rabbits were offered for barter at the bazaar.
sentences.cn: 在集市上,鸡 、 山羊和兔子被摆出来作物物交换之用.

sentences.en: Computerized cashier network is availaBle here at this Bazaar. Credit cards welcomed.
sentences.cn: 本商场收银处电脑联网,欢迎使用信用卡.

sentences.en: Find something unique this holiday season at The Gift Bazaar.
sentences.cn: 这个假期在”礼物”找一些独特的东西吧!

sentences.en: How surprised the bazaar would be if they knew what she really was thinking!
sentences.cn: 如果这些参加义卖会的人知道她此时在想些什么,他们一定会大吃一惊!

sentences.en: I am going to go shopping in the bazaar in the morning.
sentences.cn: 我上半天打算去商场购物.

sentences.en: I poked through a bazaar crammed with good.
sentences.cn: 我挤过了堆满货物的集市。

sentences.en: Kamal was a vendor in Cairo's open-air bazaar.
sentences.cn: 卡莫尔曾是开罗露天集市的摊贩。

sentences.en: Now he was far down the bazaar, riding furiously.
sentences.cn: 此时他已经飞也似地骑到远远的集市区去了.

sentences.en: The bazaar was a kaleidoscope of strange sights and impressions.
sentences.cn: 集市的景象光怪陆离,纷然杂陈.

sentences.en: The bazaar was all alive by the time we arrived.
sentences.cn: 有机会在台上唱歌.他显得很活跃.

sentences.en: We were in the bazaar with all the little urchins watching us.
sentences.cn: 我们在集市里，周围一大帮衣衫褴褛的小孩盯着我们看。

trans.tran_cn: 街市，市场，百货商店，义卖，义卖市场
trans.tran_en: a market or area where there are a lot of small shops, especially in India or the Middle East
